mapper.select: select notice.id, notice.title, notice.action, notice.state, notice.content, notice.gmt_create from lk_user_notice, notice where lk_user_notice.f_notice_id = notice.id and notice.is_deleted = 0 and lk_user_notice.`status` = 1 and lk_user_notice.f_user_id = #{id} ORDER BY notice.gmt_create DESC;
